mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PS_FREE_BOARD ORDER BY FB_NUM DESC
mapper.insert: insert into ps_free_board(fb_num, fb_subject, fb_writer, fb_regdate, fb_content, fb_hitcount) values(fb_seq.NEXTVAL, #{FB_SUBJECT}, #{FB_WRITER}, sysdate, #{FB_CONTENT}, 0)
mapper.update: update ps_free_board set fb_hitcount = fb_hitcount + 1 where fb_num = #{FB_NUM}
mapper.select: select * from ps_free_board where fb_subject LIKE '%'||#{FB_SUBJECT}||'%' order by fb_num desc
select * from ps_free_board where fb_subject LIKE '%'||#{FB_SUBJECT}||'%' or fb_content LIKE '%'||#{FB_CONTENT}||'%' order by fb_num desc
